short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Qudelix-5K Bluetooth DAC AMP Remote Controller

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Official remote controller app for Qudelix-5K Bluetooth DAC AMP

- Control/Monitor 5K DAC AMP over USB HID
- Equalizer Control
- Battery Monitor
- Device Firmware Update
- Volume Control
- DAC option
- Bluetooth Codec & Streaming Information

*This app runs with Qudelix-5K DAC AMP HW Device.
